title: Domenico Ceccarelli
text:
Domenico Ceccarelli (18 August 1905 – October 1985) was an Italian <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>.
He was born in <a href="Rome">Rome</a>.
In 1928 he was eliminated in the first round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">light heavyweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="Don%20McCorkindale">Don McCorkindale</a>.
